title: Can't login into my PBE account
body:
Yesterday i checked if my pbe account was accepted and it said it was so i downloaded the game and installed it.
After it patched and everything i tryed to login and it said "username or password is incorrect" so i tryed to recover my password first and when i tryed ot login again said same thing, then i tryed to recover my username checked my email and when i tryed to login into pbe it said same thing "username or passwrod incorrect".
Can someone pls help me with this
(sry for ban english)

replies.body: Was this a PBE account that was accepted prior to PBE re-opening or was this account recently created? If it was prior to PBE launching again, that account likely won't work and you'll need to reapply. If this was a newly created account, I'd strongly suggest hitting up our account recovery team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what went wrong. It's likely that you're using the wrong username, since your Live and PBE account names *can* be different.
